name: Bumblestorm
description:
Also for iOS / iPad Download Free

HELP!

The Nectarverse(tm) is under attack by a horde of evil robot bees! Pilot your ship using the mouse to defend the flowers from attack, use left-click to auto-fire.

STARS:

Collect stars to unlock awesome weapon upgrade pickups like Missiles, Mines, Lasers, Freeze Rays and Particle Beams!

FOOD:

Use plant food to heal damaged flower petals, if all petals die the core will implode!

MUTATIONS:

Look out because the bees have mutated other insects to help them!

BLING:

Survival bonuses awarded for completing missions with no damage to the flower. Collect Victory Badges for score multipliers and new Pilot Rankings while battling through 20 missions and 60 levels of arcade shooter action!

Good luck space adventurer!
